text: @GovSisolak Please Sir, just think what Smoking being Allowed in Casinos will cause. Temporary BAN SMOKING at least UNTIL this COVID19 is safely controlled. Exposing America to an Uncontrollable Speading brought on by the stupidity of a Simple NonSmoking Logic here In Las Vegas. What a Loss!
